snippet.title: Simulacrum - Chapter One | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Now available (pay-what-you-want or free): https://gamejolt.com/games/simulacrum_chapter_one/233384
---
It's almost ready! Simulacrum - Chapter One will be launching August 1st 2019. Inspired by horror game classics, we hope you are excited to finally follow Abigail through a dark and dangerous world in this first chapter.

Simulacrum Chapter One will be available for Windows through GameJolt. You can get the game for free, or pay what you like if you want to support us that way. (Disclaimer - at some point we may have to set a fixed price if we launch on other stores meaning Simulacrum Chapter One might only be free for a limited time.)

It will be available to play in five languages: English, German, French, Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese.

---
You can keep up to date with the progress of Simulacrum at the links below:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/simulacrumgame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SimulacrumGame
GameJolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/simulacrum-chapter-one/233384
